content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I'm sure you'll find it a great place to live. Let's focus on the rental price for now.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in the city center and has a size of 50 square meters. I think 720 Euro per month is a fair price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I disagree. 720 Euro per month is too low for my apartment. I'm looking for a higher price. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I understand, but 720 Euro is a fair price for this location and size of the apartment. I don't want to go higher than that.
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you offer is not acceptable to me.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: [END OF ROLEPLAY - THE NEGOTIATION TERMINATES HERE]
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
